page.title: 19A Waltham Child's Day.
page.content: Most mornings I get up at 7.45a.m. but at weekends at about 8.15a.m. After my favourite breakfast,bacon and egg, I have a wash and clean my teeth in the bathroom.As I am usually late, I rush upstairs and put on my blouse and jodphurs.If necessary,I wash my riding boots and collect my hat and crop.Mum gives me my swimming kit and says,"Have a nice time." Dad drives me to a local village riding school where I like to have my lesson on Taffy because he is the fastest.On the way back from riding I change into my plimsolls.When we reach the School I hurry to the swimming pool.After 30 minutes swimming I go back home,dry my hair and eat lunch. During the rest of the day I go shopping in town with my parents or, play with my friends,then watch television before going to bed.
